DOC.brief_summary: This prospective , multi-center non-randomized clinical study evaluate safety efficacy QuickFlex Micro Model 1258T leave ventricular lead heart failure patient population . The study conduct maximum 20 investigational center locate United States total 68 patient enrol .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Study QuickFlex Micro Model 1258T Left Heart Pacing Lead
DOC.detailed_description: The investigational left heart lead , QuickFlex Model 1258T , implant legally marketed St. Jude Medical cardiac resynchronization therapy implantable cardioverter defibrillator ( CRT-D ) device . Patients follow Pre-Discharge , 1-Month , 3-Month , every 6 month end study .
DOC.criteria: Approved indication CRTD system Previous cerebrovascular accident ( CVA ) transient ischemic attack ( TIA ) within 3 month enrollment Previous leave ventricular ( LV ) lead implant Have heart attack , unstable angina cardiac revascularization ( percutaneous transluminal coronary angioplasty ( PTCA ) , coronary artery bypass grafting ( CABG ) , Stent ) within 40 day prior enrollment
